Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.pitchperfectlyaccuratelypractice.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, java.util.Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Listen to views, model changes Can update view, modify model
